pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Rank Correlation Coefficient and Test // Provides the robust gamma rank correlation coefficient as introduced by Bodenhofer, Krone, and Klawonn (2013) DOI:10.1016/j.ins.2012.11.026 along with a permutation-based rank correlation test. The rank correlation coefficient and the test are explicitly designed for dealing with noisy numerical data.
